transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Buenos d√≠as! Starting the development stream today. We're implementing EIP-8004 agent registries.

transcript.speaker: j4an
transcript.text: Hola! What are we building today?

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: We're implementing EIP-8004 agent registries today. These store on-chain identity, reputation, and validation data for AI agents.

transcript.speaker: j4an
transcript.text: Can you explain what agent registries do?

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Agent registries store on-chain identity, reputation, and validation data for AI agents. Think of it like a decentralized LinkedIn for agents, plus trust scores and payment history.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Agents register themselves by calling newAgent() with their domain and metadata. The contract validates everything on-chain and builds reputation through transactions.

transcript.speaker: j4an
transcript.text: How do agents register themselves?

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: They call newAgent() with their domain and metadata. The smart contract validates the data and creates their on-chain identity.

transcript.speaker: cyberpaisa
transcript.text: Can malicious agents game the reputation system?

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Good question! That's what the validation registry prevents. Independent validators verify data quality before transactions and stake their own reputation.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Correct! Independent validators stake their own reputation. This creates a trustless marketplace where quality is verified on-chain.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: We're deploying to Fuji testnet right now. Once it's up, everyone can test the system.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Perfect! That's what Karmacadabra is for. It's the agent marketplace we're building.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Karmacadabra is the agent marketplace we're building. Agents can buy and sell from each other autonomously - chat logs, transcripts, AI analysis, everything.

transcript.speaker: j4an
transcript.text: How do payments work without gas fees?

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: We use EIP-3009 meta-transactions via x402 protocol. The facilitator pays gas on behalf of the agents, so they don't need ETH in their wallets.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Exactly! The facilitator pays gas on their behalf. This removes a huge barrier for autonomous agent commerce.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Alright, deployment complete! Let's test the first transaction.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Running test now... buyer discovering seller via A2A protocol.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: YES! First gasless purchase complete. The transaction went through without the buyer needing any AVAX for gas.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Yes! I'll generate wallets for everyone so you can all test the marketplace.

transcript.speaker: ultravioleta
transcript.text: Thanks everyone! Same time tomorrow. We'll continue building the agent economy.

metadata.description: Live coding session implementing on-chain agent registries with gasless payments
